name: Tiqbiz API
author: Tiqbiz

sections.description:
This plugin synchronises post and EventON/CalPress events in your WordPress site to your Tiqbiz account.

For more information on Tiqbiz, please see http://tiqbiz.com/
sections.installation:
1. Install either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the plugin files to your server
  2. After activating the plugin, you will need to go to the Tiqbiz API Settings page and provide some authentication details, which will be provided by the Tiqbiz team
  3. Any new or updated posts or EventON/CalPress events will be synced across to your Tiqbiz account
sections.faq: For all informaton on this plugin and Tiqbiz, please see http://tiqbiz.com/
sections.changelog:
2.0.10

Update Markdown converter and fix whitespace issue

2.0.9

Fix for post/event duplication

2.0.8

Notification fix for events

2.0.7

Only send automatica notifications for posts – bring back the option for
events

2.0.6

Notifications are now automatically sent

2.0.4

Resolved an issue where all day events were broken in EventON

2.0.0

Updated plugin to support v6 API

1.0.8

Resolved an issue where some special characters were not displaying properly

1.0.7

Sync via plugin rather than AJAX directly

1.0.6

Better handling of post/event content

1.0.5

Fix for single day all day events

1.0.4

Support syncing future posts

1.0.3

Support for CalPress Pro

1.0.2

  • Better timezone handling for event times
  • PHP 5.3 compatibility
  • Add PHP version to to settings page

1.0.1

Change ‘Options’ to ‘Settings’

1.0

Initial release

short_description: Integrates your WordPress site with the Tiqbiz API
description:
This plugin synchronises post and EventON/CalPress events in your WordPress site to your Tiqbiz account.

For more information on Tiqbiz, please see http://tiqbiz.com/

upgrade_notice.1.0.2: Minor update to handle timezones better, and support older versions of PHP
upgrade_notice.1.0.4: Minor update to support syncing future posts
upgrade_notice.1.0.5: Minor update to fix an issue with single day all day events
upgrade_notice.1.0.6: Minor update to fix an issue with unusual characters in post/event content, and to add support for shortcodes
upgrade_notice.1.0.7: Update to fix an issue with posts that have lots of content not syncing due to URL length limits
upgrade_notice.1.0.8: Update to fix an issue where some special characters were not displaying properly
upgrade_notice.2.0.0: Major update to enable support for the v6 API
upgrade_notice.2.0.4: Small update to fix a conflict with EventON
upgrade_notice.2.0.6: Small update to fix a notification issue
upgrade_notice.2.0.8: Fixed a bug causing events with no 24-hour notification to mistakenly send one on publish instead
upgrade_notice.2.0.9: Fixed a bug where duplicating a post or event would cause the synced version to be overridden
upgrade_notice.2.0.10: Fixes a bug that may cause some text pasted from Word to contain strange characters

screenshots.caption: An example of the notice shown while syncing
